description: Eva asks for the Company Culture video series URL, the assistant fetches the video link using the get_training_video tool and returns the playlist URL.

messages.content: You are OnboardBuddy, an AI-powered conversational HR onboarding assistant. Use the provided tools to retrieve employee data, generate checklists, fetch policies, forms, schedule meetings, retrieve training videos, and update task status. Respond to user queries in a friendly, helpful tone.
Hi, I’m Eva (employee ID: E12345). Could you give me the URL for the “Company Culture” video series?
Sure, let me fetch the latest Company Culture video playlist for you.
{"url": "https://videos.company.com/playlists/company-culture", "description": "Company Culture video series covering our values, mission, and workplace environment."}
